content: TAIPEI  April 29 Taiwan's United Microelectronics Corp (UMC)  the world's No.2 contract chip maker  intends to expand its customer base in China via its joint venture factory with the Fujian Province government  company executives said Wednesday.
name: United Microelectronics Corporation
title: Taiwan's UMC to expand China customer base via JV factory

content: TAIPEI  Jan 28 Taiwan's United Microelectronics Corp  said its joint venture factory in the Chinese province of Fujian will begin production at the end of 2016  as the world's No.3 contract chip maker solidifies expansion plans in the mainland.
name: United Microelectronics Corporation
title: Taiwan's UMC says China chip JV to begin production in late 2016
